idea:
ffffContent: Vice presidents for content will be responsible for the communication, case studies and all other texts that are required to be issued. They will be working in direct synergy with our writers and editors for case studies that will be provided to the members. A good hold on the same is necessary for applying to the position as you’ll be solving and discussing the same. 


Student relations: The position holder will be responsible for directly communicating to our members about the necessary information and forming and generating active interest in the cohorts internally. Strong problem solving and liaising skills are a must since eliminating problems and grievances at source will be of paramount importance.
name: fff

name: GAMEPARK PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Presently, the company operates primarily in the pharmaceutical generics market through its marketing and distribution partners. The company continues to add newer markets with market authorisations. Our desire to serve all with quality products and valuable services allows us to associate with organizations who believe in the same fundamentals of business and human values.The company is continuously increasing its market share in antimalarial products and its major revenue is drawn from the segment. We are preparing for the future by backward integration to the present business wherein we will manufacture the active ingredients from basic substance stage to be cost effective and nil reliance on import of inputs to the active substance.
name: GLENDALE BIOMED PRIVATE LIMITED
